topic.title: Quickly update screenshots when UI changes

body.p: Helpinator has three main features that help you to update screenshots quickly:

li.p: . When you store all screenshots in the image library you don't need to browse through all topics to find screenshots that you need to alter.
. This feature allows you to REcapture screenshots that are stored in the image library. Image name remains the same as well as added callouts/annotations.
. Clones share the same image with "donor" but each has it's own callouts/annotations. When UI changes you only need to update "donor" images and Helpinator updates clones automatically.
